name: {Cell}
description:
{Cell}  is a piece of interactive fiction playable on Telegram. The premise is that you wake up in a room with Cell Bot to help you (I'll leave you to figure out the rest). The gameplay interface makes use of a Telegram bot customized by me with manybot, cos I thought it'd be pretty cool if Cell Bot was an actual bot! :O

Here's the link to my game: t.me/cell_escapebot (or you can just search for @cell_escapebot on Telegram).

Have fun exploring! & do share the game with your family and friends if you enjoy playing it :)

---------
Developer's Note:

  • The Cell Assets.zip file in the downloads section below just contains the graphical & audio assets I used in the game, not the actual game program. To play the game, use the Telegram link!
  • I tried my best to make sure the game runs smoothly but building bots on Telegram is ultimately a new experience for me so please pardon bugs (if you happen to find any). Thank you~
